name: Phasic Rush
description:
Phasic Rush, our first game, is a 2D arcade zelda-like set in a mysterious medieval universe spiced up with some scifi elements. 

It's still under developement but this demo give you a fully playable level with a mini-boss. 

Be sure to follow us on Twitter : https://twitter.com/ArkkadStudio 

Note : Some functionnalities are not implemented yet and some assets will be replaced.
